attributes.action: Introduce a voucher or card scheme instead of cash for unemployment and other benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vocuher or cards should be issued that should be accepted in shops, these should be issued to all people claiming unemployment or other goverment benefits instead of cash.  Most people receiving cash benefits spend the money on alcohol and other unneccessary luxurys.  This would ensure that people spend their benefits the way the goverment intended.
